description: Try our easy to follow Roast Lamb & Veggies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Lamb & Veggies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the meat to a warm platter and cover with foil. Rest for 10 minutes before carving. Meanwhile increase the oven temperature to 200째C and continue to cook the vegetables, while the meat is resting, until golden and cooked through. Carve the two lambs and serve with the roasted vegetables.
